scripts.postinstall: if command -v rsync 2>/dev/null; then echo 'ready'; else apt-get update; apt-get install -y rsync; fi
scripts.build: rsync --delete -a src/ build; npx browserify src/modules.js -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] ] -o build/modules.js
scripts.watch: npx chokidar '.koji' -c 'npx koji-vcc; npm run build'
scripts.start: npm run watch & npm run serve
